languages.text: Before wielders next turn they performs an preemptive attack on the first enemy that attacks wielder from the protected sector. This attack is performed before the enemy's attack. After activating the ability, you cannot use AoO before preemptive attack will be performed.

traits.locale_text: Before wielders next turn they performs an preemptive attack on the first enemy that attacks wielder from the protected sector. This attack is performed before the enemy's attack. After activating the ability, you cannot use AoO before preemptive attack will be performed.

languages.text: Before the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when an enemy attacks the wielder from the protected side for the first time after this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, the wielder makes a pre-emptive attack against that enemy. That attack is performed before the enemy's attack. This {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wielder cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} before the pre-emptive attack is triggered.
languages.original_text: До начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа первую атаку, которую враг совершит против него со стороны, защищенной щитом, персонаж встретит упреждающей атакой – она будет нанесена прежде, чем враг успеет атаковать. До срабатывания этого эффекта в текущем {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ходу{/g} персонаж не может совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}

traits.locale_text: The wielder ends their turn. Before the start of their next turn, when an enemy attacks the wielder from the protected side for the first time after this ability is used, the wielder makes a pre-emptive attack against that enemy. That attack is performed before the enemy's attack. This round, the wielder cannot make attacks of opportunity before the pre-emptive attack is triggered.

Before the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when an enemy attacks the wielder from the protected side for the first time after this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, the wielder makes a pre-emptive attack against that enemy. That attack is performed before the enemy's attack. This {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wielder cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} before the pre-emptive attack is triggered.

Before the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when an enemy attacks the wielder from the protected side for the first time after this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, the wielder makes a pre-emptive attack against that enemy. That attack is performed before the enemy's attack. This {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wielder cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} before the pre-emptive attack is triggered.

Before the start of their next turn, when an enemy attacks the wielder from the protected side for the first time after this ability is used, the wielder makes a pre-emptive attack against that enemy. That attack is performed before the enemy's attack. This round, the wielder cannot make attacks of opportunity before the pre-emptive attack is triggered.

Before the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when an enemy attacks the wielder from the protected side for the first time after this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, the wielder makes a pre-emptive attack against that enemy. That attack is performed before the enemy's attack. This {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wielder cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} before the pre-emptive attack is triggered.

languages.text: До начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа первую атаку, которую враг совершит против него со стороны, защищенной щитом, персонаж встретит упреждающей атакой – она будет нанесена прежде, чем враг успеет атаковать. До срабатывания этого эффекта в текущем {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ходу{/g} персонаж не может совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}
languages.original_text: Before the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when an enemy attacks the wielder from the protected side for the first time after this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, the wielder makes a pre-emptive attack against that enemy. That attack is performed before the enemy's attack. This {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wielder cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} before the pre-emptive attack is triggered.

traits.locale_text: До начала следующего хода персонажа первую атаку, которую враг совершит против него со стороны, защищенной щитом, персонаж встретит упреждающей атакой – она будет нанесена прежде, чем враг успеет атаковать. До срабатывания этого эффекта в текущем ходу персонаж не может совершать атаки по возможности.

languages.text: Bir düşman, kullanan kişinin bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başlamadan önce ve bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} kullanıldıktan sonra ilk kez korunan taraftan kullanan kişiye saldırırsa kullanan kişi, o düşmana bir önleyici saldırı yapar. Saldırı, düşman saldırısından önce gerçekleştirilir. Kullanan kişi, bu {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} önleyici saldırı tetiklenmeden önce {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısı{/g} yapamaz.
languages.original_text: Before the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when an enemy attacks the wielder from the protected side for the first time after this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, the wielder makes a pre-emptive attack against that enemy. That attack is performed before the enemy's attack. This {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wielder cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} before the pre-emptive attack is triggered.

traits.locale_text: Bir düşman, kullanan kişinin bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başlamadan önce ve bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} kullanıldıktan sonra ilk kez korunan taraftan kullanan kişiye saldırırsa kullanan kişi, o düşmana bir önleyici saldırı yapar. Saldırı, düşman saldırısından önce gerçekleştirilir. Kullanan kişi, bu {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} önleyici saldırı tetiklenmeden önce {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısı{/g} yapamaz.

languages.text: Antes del comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, la primera vez que un enemigo ataque al portador por su lado protegido después de haber usado esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g}, el portador lanza un ataque preventivo contra ese enemigo. Ese ataque se resuelve antes que el ataque del enemigo. En este {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el portador no podrá efectuar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} antes de que se produzca este ataque preventivo.
languages.original_text: Before the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when an enemy attacks the wielder from the protected side for the first time after this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, the wielder makes a pre-emptive attack against that enemy. That attack is performed before the enemy's attack. This {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wielder cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} before the pre-emptive attack is triggered.

traits.locale_text: Antes del comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, la primera vez que un enemigo ataque al portador por su lado protegido después de haber usado esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g}, el portador lanza un ataque preventivo contra ese enemigo. Ese ataque se resuelve antes que el ataque del enemigo. En este {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el portador no podrá efectuar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} antes de que se produzca este ataque preventivo.

languages.text: 此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}发动之后，到装备者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始之前，当敌人从装备者受保护的方向首次发动攻击时，装备者会抢在敌人攻击之前，提前发动先制攻击。本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，装备者只有发动了先制攻击之后，才能正常发动{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: Before the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when an enemy attacks the wielder from the protected side for the first time after this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, the wielder makes a pre-emptive attack against that enemy. That attack is performed before the enemy's attack. This {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wielder cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} before the pre-emptive attack is triggered.

traits.locale_text: 此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}发动之后，到装备者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始之前，当敌人从装备者受保护的方向首次发动攻击时，装备者会抢在敌人攻击之前，提前发动先制攻击。本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，装备者只有发动了先制攻击之后，才能正常发动{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text: Avant le prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur, la première fois qu'un ennemi l'attaque du côté du bouclier après l'utilisation de cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}, il lance une attaque préventive contre l'assaillant. Cette attaque s'effectue avant celle de l'ennemi. Lors de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, l'utilisateur ne peut pas effectuer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} avant le déclenchement de l'attaque préventive.
languages.original_text: Before the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when an enemy attacks the wielder from the protected side for the first time after this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, the wielder makes a pre-emptive attack against that enemy. That attack is performed before the enemy's attack. This {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wielder cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} before the pre-emptive attack is triggered.

traits.locale_text: Avant le prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur, la première fois qu'un ennemi l'attaque du côté du bouclier après l'utilisation de cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g}, il lance une attaque préventive contre l'assaillant. Cette attaque s'effectue avant celle de l'ennemi. Lors de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, l'utilisateur ne peut pas effectuer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} avant le déclenchement de l'attaque préventive.

languages.text: 次の自身の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始前に、この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用中の使用者に敵が防御サイドから初めて攻撃する時、使用者はその敵に対して先制攻撃を行う。この攻撃は敵の攻撃前に行われる。この{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}では、先制攻撃が発動するまで使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}できない。
languages.original_text: Before the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when an enemy attacks the wielder from the protected side for the first time after this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, the wielder makes a pre-emptive attack against that enemy. That attack is performed before the enemy's attack. This {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wielder cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} before the pre-emptive attack is triggered.

traits.locale_text: 次の自身の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始前に、この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用中の使用者に敵が防御サイドから初めて攻撃する時、使用者はその敵に対して先制攻撃を行う。この攻撃は敵の攻撃前に行われる。この{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}では、先制攻撃が発動するまで使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}できない。

languages.text: Greift ein Gegner den Träger vor seinem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} zum ersten Mal von der geschützten Seite an, nachdem diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eingesetzt wurde, macht der Träger einen Präventivangriff auf diesen Gegner. Dieser Angriff erfolgt vor dem Angriff des Gegners. In dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} kann der Träger keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} ausführen, ehe der Präventivangriff ausgeführt wird.
languages.original_text: Before the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when an enemy attacks the wielder from the protected side for the first time after this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used, the wielder makes a pre-emptive attack against that enemy. That attack is performed before the enemy's attack. This {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wielder cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} before the pre-emptive attack is triggered.

traits.locale_text: Greift ein Gegner den Träger vor seinem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} zum ersten Mal von der geschützten Seite an, nachdem diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} eingesetzt wurde, macht der Träger einen Präventivangriff auf diesen Gegner. Dieser Angriff erfolgt vor dem Angriff des Gegners. In dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} kann der Träger keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} ausführen, ehe der Präventivangriff ausgeführt wird.
